price: 85. Maalinta aan u soo gelbin kuwa iska jiray (shirkiga iyo xumaha kale) xagga Raxmaanka (Alle) iyagoo wafdi (sharaf leh) ah.
arabic: يَوۡمَ نَحۡشُرُ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ إِلَى ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ وَفۡدٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: yawma naḥshuru al-mutaqīna ilā al-raḥmāni wafdan
